name: Avoid PL1 Errors Blocks having ON ERROR SYSTEM blocks and not containing and displaying ONCODE and ONLOC (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all PL1 Errors  Blocks having ON ERROR SYSTEM blocks and not containing and displaying ON CODE and ONLOC.
output:
The report lists all the  PL1 Errors  Blocks having ON ERROR SYSTEM blocks and not containing and displaying ON CODE and ONLOC.

It provides following information: 
- PL1 Errors  Blocks full name
rationale: A more information about the error is provided by ONCODE and ONLOC, which is required and useful.
remediation: Always have ONCODE and ONLOC statement for the blocks having ON ERROR.
total: Number of the PL1 Errors  Blocks.
